text: Hooaga dono daiaa, gei David ga ala aga, i muli hua dana hagi anga ana siibi gi tangada gi madamada humalia ai, gei mee gaa kae nia meegai aalaa gii hai be nnelekai o dono damana go Jesse. Mee gaa dau adu gi di waahale laa i di madagoaa hua dela e haga maanege ai digau dauwa o Israel gi di gowaa dela belee hai ai tauwa, mo di wwolowwolo gi nua nadau lee dauwa.
